duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide architectural blueprints, diagrams, and technical leadership to the Development team.
Work closely with the business to identify solution requirements, key case-studies/scenarios, and documentation.
Lead the design of business object models, application business objects, business services, implementation frameworks, and application services.
Determine the most appropriate architecture and application partitioning to achieve performance, security, SEO checklist, extensibility, reusability, and scalability requirements.
Communicate effectively with customers, project managers, product owners, and development team members to facilitate understanding of deliverables, estimates, and prioritization.
Lead and mentor teams, ensuring standards and best practices for code quality are followed during project execution.
Drive hands-on delivery of critical business initiatives for clients, project planning, requirements gathering, risk management, communication, and implementation planning.
Perform peer code reviews, create high/low level technical architecture and design related documents.
Ensure best practices, coding standards, and guidelines are agreed upon during project initiation and followed on an ongoing basis.
Follow Continuous Integration & Deployment (CI/CD) processes for code migration, conducting code reviews as per project guidelines.
Follow the solution’s technical framework and design during implementation, be it coding or bug fixing.
Perform Proof of Concept (POC) and discovery work for new data integrations, monitor, troubleshoot, and recover failed data related jobs in a timely manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, CIS, MIS, Engineering (Any), or related field, 5 years of experience in Technical Architecture role
